key.name: tracker-shape
key.description: Sets the shape or cursor to be used as the tracker shape.

key.name: tracker-size
key.description: Sets the size of the tracker element in pixels.

key.name: tracker-color
key.description: Sets the color of the tracker.

key.name: tracker-opacity
key.description: Sets the opacity of the tracker from 0 (transparent) to 100 (opaque).

key.name: tracker-active
key.description: Sets the active state of the tracker.

key.name: tracker-keybinding
key.summary: Keyboard shortcut for toggling the tracker
key.description: Sets the keyboard shortcut that toggles the tracker.
